name: Gunship II
summary:
Immerse yourself into the mist of the Vietnam war as an US helicopter pilot.
Be part of the new air mobility tactic which helicopters are heavily used to insert troops into battles, transport supplies and weapons to the most remote outposts, hover and pickup a downed pilot in cross fires or fly dangerous low level Hunter-Killer mission.
Choose from 5 Vietnam War choppers to fly with an intuitive combination of touch-screen and accelerometer controls.
